12.content: Who will he gain with

1231.content:
Devon was a Normal middle schooler. 12 years old. medium blonde hair. pure blue eyes. A nice little country club boy. He only weighed about 94 pounds and was about 5'6. One day Decon was walking down the hall when his friend connor called for him
"Hey Dev...Wanna come over after school today?"
1231.title: Force

12311.content:
Later that day Devon walked up to connors front door and rang the bell. Almost imediatly connor answered.
"HI Dev! Come on in! My mom isnt home now but she will be soon." Devon walked into connors house and looked around. He had never seen a bigger house! Connor walked in holding a glass of kool-aid. " Hey De want some-Woah!" Connor tripped over his bookbag and fell right onto Devon. Devon felt a little akward but still relaxed as connor stood brushing himself off..."Im so sorry Dev! Why dont you go get in the bath and ill go put your clothes in the wash!"
12311.title: Goes to connors house

info.brief_description: Males of all ages will gain weight in this interactive story
info.description: This story is a MALE weight gain. Females may gain with males but females are not the main charectar. Anything goes except killing off the main charectar. Males of all ages will gain weight.
